The Destruction Of The Demons Of The Messenger Of DarknessThe Dark Elven Village
The dark Elves tried to resurrect Shillien to avenge his people, but the Goddess of Destruction, finding strength, easily sacrificed his followers. Realizing that from Shillien good can be expected, the surviving Dark Elves refused to worship her and left the village.

Now Dark Elven Village was taken by the Demons of the Messenger of Darkness that got in here through a dimensional Rift. By themselves they do not pose any significant danger, but for them out of Darkness crawling other monsters, much worse...
If You do not wish harm to this world, help to destroy the Demons of the Messenger of Darkness, creatures of the cursed Shillien.
